Title: Sounds Like
Plot: Based on a short story by Mike O?Driscoll. The story of Larry Pearce, an ordinary man blessed with gift/curse of extraordinary hearing that drives him to the brink of insanity, and forces him to take violent action to silence the horrific cacophony in his head.
ParentalRatingReason: Contains sex scenes, offensive language and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Chris Bauer, Laura Margolis, Nicholas Elia, Richard Kahan, Michael Daingerfield, David Allan Pearson, David Lovgren
